name: ascd-assignment-4-doug-waffle
description: This respository is intended for the use of Focus College Students enrolled in the Advanced Certificate of Software Development located in Kelowna, BC and Surrey, BC.

scripts.start:build: npm run build:compile && npm run start
scripts.start:build:lint: npm run build:lint && npm run build:compile && npm run start
scripts.start:build:lint:format: npm run build:lint && npm run build:format && npm run build:compile && npm run start
scripts.start:build:lint:format:test: npm run build:lint && npm run build:format && npm run test && npm run build:compile && npm run start
